title: Verb Collection 1
sentences: The committee definitely objects to the quality of the submitted plan.
azt a sok segítséget, amit tőled kaptunk.
We highly appreciate all the help we received from you.
The doctor labored a lot for the patient's recovery.
The director urges/promotes the introduction of new technologies.
Unfortunately, you have been neglecting your studies lately.
Time is pressing us; we must decide soon.
The new evidence clearly refutes the previous theory.
The witness described the circumstances of the accident in detail.
The prisoner languished for years in the dark prison cell.
az erdőben, mire megtalálta a helyes utat.
He wandered/erred in the forest for a long time before finding the right path.
Látszott rajta, hogy kényelmetlenül érzi magát és
It was visible that he felt uncomfortable and was fidgeting/uneasy.
We must thoroughly weigh the consequences of our decision.
The speaker briefly outlined the main points of the research.
The thick fog significantly hindered the traffic.
The goal of the new law is to promote economic growth.
Finally, she managed to procure/bring about a meeting with the minister.
Everyone was asked to beware of suspicious offers.
The police suspect the former employee of theft.
a kormányt a magas adók miatt.
Many condemn the government because of the high taxes.
The crowd was loudly indignant about the unjust verdict.
The graph illustrates the population change well.
The bad news only aggravated/capped his sadness.
The critic sharply criticized the director's latest film.
The committee ignored/disregarded my proposal without explanation.
The journalists were inquiring/prying for answers about the politician's past.
dictionary:
kifogásol - to object to
méltányol - to appreciate / value
fáradozik - to labor / strive
szorgalmaz - to urge / promote
hanyagol - to neglect
sürget - to urge / rush someone
cáfol - to refute / deny
ecsetel - to describe in detail / paint a picture of
sínylődik - to languish / suffer
tévelyeg - to wander / err
feszeng - to be uneasy / fidget
mérlegel - to weigh / consider
vázol - to outline / sketch
akadályoz - to hinder / obstruct
előmozdít - to promote / advance
kieszközöl - to procure / bring about
óvakodik - to beware of
gyanúsít - to suspect
kárhoztat - to condemn / blame
méltatlankodik - to be indignant
szemléltet - to illustrate / demonstrate
tetéz - to aggravate / cap / crown
bírál - to criticize / judge
mellőz - to ignore / disregard
firtat - to inquire / pry / investigate
